name: BattleBots
description:
"BattleBots" is a !Work In Progress! Action genre Video Game in which 4 players, controling a Bot each, fight till total destruction in the BattleBot Arena. The first one to get a certain number of kills wins! 

At the beginning of each game, each player will be able to modify their Bot before starting. There are 4 Bots (all inspired by animals (Crab, Hammerhead Shark, Manta Ray and Angler Fish) (when the game is released there will be lots of different weapons (Beam Rifle, Grenade Launcher, Laser Machine Gun, Flamethrower, Beam Cannon...) and also different abilities to choose from (Jump, Boost, Heal, Shield)), plenty to make a real carnage!
And the Arena itself is filled with traps (Flame Pit, Push Box, Spring Plate, Disappearing Blocks...) Teleporters and moving Platforms. 

This Video Game was conceived by three Game Designer (including me) and three Game Artists in three weeks with Unity.
